name: Verfiy POST external Chat API /v1/chat/completions returns valid data
description:
### Pre-conditions:
- DeepSeek app installed.

### Steps:
- Login with valid credentials.
- POST `external` OpenAI Compatible Chat API `{hostname}/v1/chat/completions`.

### Verify that:

- API response matching expected json schema.
descriptionHtml:
Pre-conditions:

  • DeepSeek app installed.

Steps:

  • Login with valid credentials.
  • POST external OpenAI Compatible Chat API {hostname}/v1/chat/completions.

Verify that:

  • API response matching expected json schema.
statusMessage:
AssertionError: [ContentTypeError] during step: Verify POST to external Compatible Chat API /v1/chat/completions returns valid data
Message: 504, message='Attempt to decode JSON with unexpected mimetype: text/plain', url='https://deepseek--e98447c4c09f46468bb6c240053aa5be.apps.dev.apolo.us/v1/chat/completions'
statusTrace:
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:49: in wrapper
    result = await func(*args, **kwargs)
             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
tests/test_cases/steps/api_steps/api_steps.py:308: in verify_external_chat_api_completions
    status, response = await self._api_helper._post(
tests/utils/api_helper.py:91: in _post
    json_data = await response.json()
                ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
.venv/lib/python3.13/site-packages/aiohttp/client_reqrep.py:749: in json
    raise ContentTypeError(
E   aiohttp.client_exceptions.ContentTypeError: 504, message='Attempt to decode JSON with unexpected mimetype: text/plain', url='https://deepseek--e98447c4c09f46468bb6c240053aa5be.apps.dev.apolo.us/v1/chat/completions'

The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception:
tests/test_cases/tests_e2e/test_deep_seek_app.py:536: in test_ext_chat_endpoint_completions
    await api_steps.verify_external_chat_api_completions(
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:58: in wrapper
    raise AssertionError(formatted_msg) from e
